mapper.insert: insert into user_fund_product(userId, fundId, averYield, profit, status) values (#{userId},#{fundId},#{averYield},#{profit},#{status})
mapper.update: update user_fund_product set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select ufp.id id, userId, fundId, startTime, averYield, profit, status, fundDesc,leastMoney, invesTerm from user_fund_product ufp join fund_product fp on ufp.fundId = fp.id where ufp.userId = #{userId}
order by leastMoney
order by averYield
order by status
